sourcesContent:
import './../Pages/AddJob/AddJob.css' import RadioButtons from '../RadioButtons/RadioButtons' function InputTwo(props) { const buttons = [ { name: 'Yes, I need help' }, { name: 'No, Thanks', color: 'black' }, ]; function handleValue(e) { const target = e.target; const { name, value } = target; props.setInputValues2({ ...props.InputValues2, [name]: value }); } return (

Company business details

Select vacancy information.

Would you like us to help you manage interviews and provide advice according to our extensive experience within the Human Resources Management Department?

Note: Activating the interview management service will increase the cost of publishing the job advertisement by 10,000 SYP

) } export default InputTwo
